comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: In the summer of 1914, Boardman was working to be able to accept the offer from the Hamburg-American Line ot the liner Hamburg and to equip it as a hospital ship. Perhaps these photos were associated with that activity. See NYT of 8/29/1914 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9406EEDE1638E633A... and 9/7/1914 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=940DE5DC1638E633A...
